84 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
85 // Class stSlimNode
86 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
113 class stSlimNode{
114  public:
118  enum stSlimNodeType{
122  INDEX = 0x4449, // In little endian "ID"
123 
127  LEAF = 0x464C // In little endian "LF"
128  };//end stNodeType
129 
133  virtual ~stSlimNode(){
134  }//end ~stSlimNode()
135 
142  stNodeType GetNodeType(){
143  return Header->Type;
144  }//end GetNodeType
145 
151  stPage * GetPage(){
152  return Page;
153  }//end GetPage
154 
160  stPageID GetPageID(){
161  return Page->GetPageID();
162  }//end GetPage
163 
170  static stSlimNode * CreateNode(stPage * page);
171 
180  stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
181  return this->Header->Occupation;
182  }//end GetNumberOfEntries
183 
195  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object) = 0;
196 
207  virtual const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx) = 0;
208 
219  virtual stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx) = 0;
220 
224  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius() = 0;
225 
229  void RemoveAll(){
230 
231  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
232  stNodeType type;
233  type = Header->Type;
234  Page->Clear();
235  Header->Type = type;
236  #else
237  this->Header->Occupation = 0;
238  #endif //__stDEBUG__
239  }//end RemoveAll
240 
244  virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount() = 0;
245 
249  static stSize GetGlobalOverhead(){
250  return sizeof(stSlimNodeHeader);
251  }//end GetGlobalOverhead()
252 
253  protected:
257  #pragma pack(1)
258  typedef struct stSlimNodeHeader{
262  stNodeType Type;
263 
267  stCount Occupation;
268  } stSlimNodeHeader; //end stHeader
269  #pragma pack()
270 
274  stSlimNodeHeader * Header;
275 
279  stPage * Page;
280 
286  stSlimNode(stPage * page){
287  this->Page = page;
288  Header = (stSlimNodeHeader *)(this->Page->GetData());
289  }//end stSlimNode
290 };//end stSlimNode

292 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
293 // Class stSlimIndexNode
294 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
325 // +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
326 // | Type | Occupation | PgID0 | Dist0 | NEnt0 | Radius0 | OffSet0 |...|PgIDn | Distn | NEntn | Radiusn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
327 // +---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
328 class stSlimIndexNode: public stSlimNode{
329  public:
333  #pragma pack(1)
334  typedef struct stSlimIndexEntry{
338  stPageID PageID;
339 
343  stDistance Distance;
344 
348  stCount NEntries;
349 
353  stDistance Radius;
354 
360  stSize Offset;
361  } stSlimIndexEntry; //end stIndexEntry
362  #pragma pack()
363 
375  stSlimIndexNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
376 
390  stSlimIndexEntry & GetIndexEntry(stCount idx){
391  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
392  if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
393  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
394  }//end if
395  #endif //__stDEBUG__
396 
397  return Entries[idx];
398  }//end GetIndexEntry
399 
418  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
419 
423  int GetRepresentativeEntry();
424 
435  const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);
436 
446  stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
447 
456  void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
457 
461  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
462 
466  virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount();
467 
471  static stSize GetIndexEntryOverhead(){
472  return sizeof(stSlimIndexEntry);
473  }//end GetIndexEntryOverhead()
474 
475  private:
476 
480  stSlimIndexEntry * Entries;
481 
485  stSize GetFree();
486 
487 };//end stSlimIndexPage

489 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
490 // Class stSlimLeafNode
491 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
520 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
521 // | Type | Occupation | Dist0 | OffSet0 | Distn | OffSetn | <-- blankspace --> |Objn |...|Obj0 |
522 // +--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
523 class stSlimLeafNode: public stSlimNode{
524  public:
528  #pragma pack(1)
529  typedef struct stSlimLeafEntry{
533  stDistance Distance;
534 
540  stSize Offset;
541  } stSlimLeafEntry; //end stLeafEntry
542  #pragma pack()
543 
555  stSlimLeafNode(stPage * page, bool create = false);
556 
570  stSlimLeafEntry & GetLeafEntry(stCount idx){
571  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
572  if (idx >= GetNumberOfEntries()){
573  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
574  }//end if
575  #endif //__stDEBUG__
576 
577  return Entries[idx];
578  }//end GetLeafEntry
579 
598  virtual int AddEntry(stSize size, const stByte * object);
599 
605  int GetRepresentativeEntry();
606 
617  const stByte * GetObject(stCount idx);
618 
628  stSize GetObjectSize(stCount idx);
629 
640  void RemoveEntry(stCount idx);
641 
645  virtual stDistance GetMinimumRadius();
646 
650  virtual stCount GetTotalObjectCount(){
651  return (stCount)GetNumberOfEntries();
652  }//end GetTotalObjectCount()
653 
657  static stSize GetLeafEntryOverhead(){
658  return sizeof(stSlimLeafEntry);
659  }//end GetLeafEntryOverhead()
660 
661  private:
665  stSlimLeafEntry * Entries;
666 
670  stSize GetFree();
671 };//end stSlimLeafNode

673 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
674 // Class stSlimMemLeafNode
675 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
695 template < class ObjectType >
696 class stSlimMemLeafNode{
697  public:
698 
705  stSlimMemLeafNode(stSlimLeafNode * leafNode);
706 
715  stSlimLeafNode * ReleaseNode();
716 
727  bool Add(ObjectType * obj, stDistance distance);
728 
732  stCount GetNumberOfEntries(){
733  return this->numEntries;
734  }//end GetNumberOfObjects
735 
743  ObjectType * ObjectAt(stCount idx){
744  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
745  if (idx >= this->numEntries){
746  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
747  }//end if
748  #endif //__stDEBUG__
749  return Entries[idx].Object;
750  }//end ObjectAt
751 
758  ObjectType * LastObject(){
759  return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Object;
760  }//end LastObject
761 
767  ObjectType * RepObject(){
768  return Entries[0].Object;
769  }//end RepObject
770 
777  stDistance DistanceAt(stCount idx){
778  #ifdef __stDEBUG__
779  if (idx >= this->numEntries){
780  throw invalid_argument("idx value is out of range.");
781  }//end if
782  #endif //__stDEBUG__
783 
784  return Entries[idx].Distance;
785  }//end DistanceAt
786 
791  stDistance LastDistance(){
792  return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
793  }//end LastDistance
794 
801  ObjectType * Remove(stCount idx);
802 
806  ObjectType * PopObject();
807 
813  bool CanAdd(ObjectType * obj){
814  int entrySize;
815 
816  // Does it fit ?
817  entrySize = obj->GetSerializedSize() + stSlimLeafNode::GetLeafEntryOverhead();
818  if (entrySize + this->usedSize > this->maximumSize){
819  // No, it doesn't.
820  return false;
821  }//end if
822  // yes, it does.
823  return true;
824  }//end CanAdd
825 
831  stDistance GetMinimumRadius(){
832  return Entries[this->numEntries-1].Distance;
833  }//end GetMinimumRadius
834 
840  stSize GetFreeSize(){
841  return (this->maximumSize - this->usedSize);
842  }//end GetFreeSize
843 
844  private:
848  struct stSlimMemNodeEntry{
852  ObjectType * Object;
853 
857  stDistance Distance;
858  };
859 
863  stCount numEntries;
864 
868  stCount capacity;
869 
873  stSlimMemNodeEntry * Entries;
874 
878  stSize maximumSize;
879 
883  stSize usedSize;
884 
888  stSlimLeafNode * srcLeafNode;
889 
898  int InsertPosition(stDistance distance);
899 
904  void Resize(stCount incSize = 16);
905 
906 };//end stSlimMemLeafNode

911 #endif //__STSLIMNODE_H
